title: Immersive Language Instruction Design Using 360° VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foreign language learning experience
context.additional_context: Requires establishing a language learning environment utilizing 360° VR content within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners enhance communication skills by immersively experiencing real-life conversational scenarios in the target language within a 360° VR environment.
Learners acquire the method of segmenting language-learning 360° videos by topic and adding subtitles using VR content editing tools.
Learners share and provide feedback on 360° language-learning content with peer trainees via a collaborative platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
